document_data.caption: A map showing the Old Temple Lot in the Castle Ward.
document_data.name: Old Temple Lot
document_data.mainbody: The '''Old Temple Lot''' was a small courtyard located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The courtyard was found in southern Waterdeep within the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] near the southern end of [[Mount Waterdeep]]. The Old Temple Lot was bordered by [[Tarnished Silver Alley]] to the north and east, [[Coin Alley]] to the west, and [[Sail Street]] to the south.
